reviews.review:
Reasons I DON'T RECOMMEND this game, even though I spend hours of fun with it.

1º The BUGS are getting worse every day.
2nd Banned for an error both by STEAM when updating or for every time the game expels you from a game that has already started.
3º Much update but little to solve.
4th They promise but then they like to sweat it
5th The brutal HITSBOT each time they get worse and worse
6º They make you wait a long time in the lobby and then expel you at all times, or even at the end of a game, and even when they start throwing you little signs saying YOU HAVE BEEN DISCONNECTED FROM THE SERVER or ERROR.

Think about spending on this game, because it is not worth giving a penny. They are warned, although I play it, it does not mean that the game is the fucking host because it is no longer cool. Many unpleasant acts.

SPANISH 

Razones por las que NO RECOMIENDO este juego, a pesar de que le dedico horas de diversión.. 

1º Los BUGS cada día están peor.
2º Baneados por un error tanto por parte de STEAM a la hora de actualizar o por cada vez que el juego te expulsa de una partida ya empezada.
3º Mucho actualizar pero poco solucionar.
4º Prometen pero después como que se la sudan 
5º Los HITSBOT brutal cada vez lo empeoran más y más
6º Te hacen esperar mucho en el lobby para después expulsarte a cada rato, o incluso al terminar una partida, e incluso empezada que te lanzan letreros diciendo SE TE A DESCONECTADO DEL SERVIDOR ó ERROR.

Pensaros gastar en este juego, porque no merece la pena ni darle un céntimo. Avisados están, aunque yo lo juegue no significa que el juego sea la puta hostia porque ya no mola. Muchos actos injustos.
после новой обновы маньяки стали дергаться, камеры ловят отборный кайф , приходится остерегаться досок ибо ман влетает в них
Matchmaking's a bit bugged but other than that, it's a great game with lots of suspense and fun. Though, if you're playing as killer, you're gonna get shit on a lot.

I love this game. It's very challenging and interesting, quite immersive. However, as a new player I have come across serious problems with the matchmaking in this game. It is not fair that I have to go against red ranks in this game because they have one level 17 with them and they're a toxic group. It's almost like the devs just want you to tilt with the way that the game matches people and favours survivors so heavily.
игра классная если играть с друзьями

Игра с себя представляет кооперативное выживание, 4 выживших и 1 маньяк, выжившим надо починить генераторы и забежать от рук маньяка, а маньяку надо всех убить, так же по всей карте есть припятствие для маньяка чтобы выжившие моглы убежать от него. Игра достойна внимания!!!
This game is good, he have a lot of bugs, but this is beautiful.

The devs aren´t and never were good at their own game, so they try to remove any form of skill from the game and make it as casual and uncompetitive as possible, focussing more on cosmetics and getting your money rather than improving gameplay, matchmaking or balancing.

The best supported and constantly updated game on Steam. Balanced on a continuous basis, even if a survivor or killer doesn't agree with the changes being implemented. As a 4v1 there are not many, if any that can compare. GG WP!!
网络有时无法连接，连接不上主办方，无法创建队伍，低分段只能玩人，玩屠夫不是网络连接失败就是找不到房间。

作为老玩家只能说，浪费了我的时间。
改版幅度太大，稍微不玩一会儿，就跟不上版本了
游戏整体还是呈现向极端化发展，即人类速修和屠夫游走针对
人类非常难玩，屠夫也非常难玩，这就是你们发展了六年的结果
六年来一直在砍人类和加强屠夫，也能理解，因为人类玩家的水平在进步，总不可能现在还仍然是LT双窗双板吧。
但是游戏总要进步，希望可以有较大的玩法突破，打破一直以来的钳制，讲道理，一直一个玩法真心无趣
the hottest semi horror survival game I've played 10 out of 10
游戏是好玩 但是实际游戏体验 各种小问题很烦人 游戏闪退  进游戏有人掉了游戏就卡死  反外挂程序检测不出来 游戏文件缺失  各种各样的毛病让我上不去游戏  还有网络的问题  拔插屠夫和拔线人 惩罚力度加大点 谢谢
muy bueno el juego lo recomiendo
各种保存游戏出错 进不去游戏 什么玩意
大家好我是一个普通的深夜单排古书人，不求段位多高，只求好看的衣服。在这里想告诉各位：“血点是肝不完的！注意身体啊古书[spoiler] （印豆）[/spoiler]人们”
这里找一个id叫 火星老汉 的兄弟，那把我是托马斯，你好像是杰克，你和队友溜了一局，我是那个修了4台机那个，这把太快乐乐，我忘记加你好友了你看到我赶紧加我一起啊wdnmd！我当时id是wdnmd别刀我刀柜子好吗，快带我打打，我他妈是个萌新兄弟
If you have the time and friends, totally buy it!
Great game. Warning: People will cry if you take them out. They obviously have never watched a slasher film and expect you to run around playing tag with them. lol.
The game is fun and sometimes it can be very very frustrating and more fun to play with friends, but if you want to go at it alone, play as the killer.
this game really makes you feel like a killer
新手多练练 可以带个机遇之窗记一下板位  多练转点 贴膜什么的 就容易好打很多了

Overall great game, recommend for anyone who is into horror/action games. Stunning graphics, awesome characters, great maps, and overall a masterpiece.


10/10 would recommend to anyone.
It's really fun if you're a fan of horror games like friday the 13th

One of my favorite multiplayer games out at the moment. While it can be a bit unbalanced at times its still a blast most of the time. That being said though, the community can be rather toxic so that's a bit of a bummer.
just give it a shot its not a balanced game at all but u'll get use to it and just make it really fun

This game may have duplicate gameplay
But you can also be a killer and tunnel

Great game, great people, very spooky. I really wish there were more killers, like maybe "The Thing" from the 1982 classic John Carpenters "The Thing. That would be super awesome. Otherwise this game is really fun to play with friends and also by yourself late at night.
This game is great, it reminds me of running away from my father when I was little
El juego tiene mucho bugs y no vale la pena gastar!!
Very unique game. Cat and mouse aspect,difficult but that much more rewarding when you win.
la verdad es muy buen juego yo me estoy volviendo adicta de  hecho
접을려고 백번 천번 만번을 생각했으나 포기할수없었습니다
Super jeux à jouer en équipe. Il sera plus facile de jouer avec des personnes en discutant au micro. Ideal quand on aime jouer sneeky et se faire un chouilla peur :)
不好玩 玩了一会儿就卸载了
游戏是好游戏，但是匹配机制实在是不行。逃生者基本都是秒排，屠夫几乎排不到人。萌新不推荐买DLC，除非你要的是里面的逃生者，有些dlc的屠夫确实很强，但是你玩不到，20分钟一把也不是每个人都能等的。
the game is a very fun game to play but i recommend having friends who also play if you wanna play survivor because solo survivor queueing isn't very fun but playing killer alone is a ton of fun!
Too Many Bug,And the server is too lag.
Mecanicas buenas aunque hay asesinos un poco rotos con ciertas habilidades lo cual lo hace un reto genial para hechar horas.
fantastic game, especially bubba being a fat killer is so cute. but really the game is an awesome tactical horror survival game that anyone can enjoy, so long as they have no history

He jugado a este juego durante un mes y al principio puede ser difícil cogerle el truco pero a medida que se juega vas entendiéndolo hasta que se vuelve bastante entretenido. muy buen survival horror online.
Árbol de habilidades, disponibilidad de varios mapas, distinta experiencia de juego dependiendo el personaje que se utilice
very fun game but i really think that if you play predominantly as a survivor it would only be fun with friends.
Very fun game and very unique. Would recommend for people who like unique horror games. Keep in mind that this game is very buggy though but over all I would give it a 8 out of 10

[ dead by buglight ]
fun to play with friends

February 2021 Update:
NEVER MIND THE NEW UI + MOVEMENT MECHANICS + BUGS ARE GARBAGE
one of the most addictive game ever played
El juego esta bueno aunque ultimamente no me encuentra partida
The game may be toxic sometimes but that's where the fun comes from, play it with friends and gen rush the killer or play the killer and tunnel one survivor. No ones gonna stop you
Fun playing as survivor but the first matches its literally imposible to win just one game, should nerf somehow the killers just the first games.
